trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Kentwood
There were no other sightings in Kentwood on or around July 27th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsThis was during marching band camp in the football field. When the director told us to sit down, we did, and while I was listening I looked to my left. I saw a Spherical object slowly going low across the sky. It made 1 stop, then kept going in the same direction. I felt happy. This is not the first time I have seen it. It usually appears when I am in a good mood. I lost sight of it when it went below the horizon.
Summary: A spherical object moving slowly across the sky.
